column1: Industrial Engineering and International Management MSc
column5: YOUR INDUSTRIAL ENGINEERING AND INTERNATIONAL MANAGEMENT MASTER’S PROGRAMDo you have a Bachelor’s degree in engineering or a science subject? Do you want to expand your skills while learning how to live up to the challenges of the Fourth Industrial Revolution at the same time? And do you look forward to a study program that gives you the very tools you need for a future job in the industry of tomorrow? Then the Master’s program Industrial Engineering and International Management (M.Sc.) could just be what you are looking for.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
